name: Creamy Nacho Dip
author: DaDD
summary: A fast and easy dip! We often bought a dip at a little market. I decided to try to replicate it, with success.
ingredients: ½ cup light mayonnaise (such as Hellmann's Light®)
1 teaspoon vegetable bouillon (such as Knorr®)), or more to taste
1 tablespoon taco seasoning mix (such as Old El Paso®)
1 cup shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend
directions: Stir sour cream, mayonnaise, salsa, vegetable bouillon, and   mix together in a bowl until smooth
Fold cheese into the creamy mixture
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 15 minutes
